text: "Brilliant Disguise" is a 1987 song by Bruce Springsteen. It is the leading single from his eighth studio album Tunnel of Love. It went to number 20 in the United Kingdom, number 5 in the United States, number 1 in Norway, number 15 in the Netherlands, number 26 in New Zealand, number 3 in Sweden, number 2 in Ireland, number 9 in Canada, number 7 in Italy and number 16 in Switzerland. It was nominated for a Grammy Award in 1988. == References == Category:1987 songs Category:Bruce Springsteen songs Category:Pop rock songs
title: Brilliant Disguise
